message: Hi Bob, I'm offering a fantastic product at the amazing price of $120. It's a steal you don't want to miss!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $90 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $120 is a very fair price for this product. I'm willing to come down a bit to $105, but that's my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $95 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
